text:
Zalalövő
Zalalövő
is a town in
Zala County
in the valley of Zala river .
Understand
The Roman legions created a military camp on the northern shore of the Zala river at the beginning of the 1st century .
Around the camp a village-like settlement founded .
In 124 , Emperor Hadrian gave town status for the settlement , and called as Municipium Aelium Salla .
However , in the middle of the 2nd century the invading Germanic tribes destroyed the settlement .
According to a 13th-century document , royal archers lived here .
Zalalövő was elevated to town status in 2000 .
This article includes travel-related information not only for Zalalövő , but also for the surrounding rural areas .
By train
Direct trains are available once a day from
Budapest
-Déli pályaudvar via
Székesfehérvár
,
Veszprém
and
Zalaegerszeg
.
The journey takes 4 hours and costs 4840 Ft.
Other direct connections are :
Toward east :
Zalaegerszeg
seven times a day .
The journey takes about 30 minutes and costs 465 Ft.
Toward west :
Őriszentpéter
seven times a day .
The journey takes about 15 minutes and costs 310 Ft. There are direct international trains via Bajánsenye to Hodoš (
Slovenia
) four times a day , and to
Ljubljana
once a day .
Zalalövő Train Station
, Táncsics
Mihály utca 10 , ☏ +361 349-4949 , ✉ informacio@mav-start.hu .
There is no ticket office , tickets can be purchased on the train .
The train station is just 700 m away from the center .
By bus
Frequent buses are available from
Zalaegerszeg
.
The journey takes about 30 minutes and costs 465 Ft. From
Budapest
-Népliget , you have to transfer in Zalaegerszeg .
The whole journey from Budapest takes 4 hours and costs 4770 Ft.
Get around
There is no local public transport or taxi service .
You can use the regional buses operated by
ÉNYKK
.
See
In Zalalövő :
All Saints Roman Catholic Chapel
( Mindenszentek római katolikus kápolna ) , Petőfi Sándor utca 100 .
Built in 1743 in Baroque style .
Borosán Valley and Holy Well
( Borosán-völgy és Szentkút ) .
John of Nepomuk Sculpture
( Nepomuki Szent János-szobor ) , Kolozsvári utca 4 .
Built in 1810 in late Baroque style .
Saint Anne Roman Catholic Church
( Szent Anna római katolikus templom ) , Kossuth Lajos utca 66 , Zalapataka .
Built in 1753 in Baroque style .
Saint Ladislaus Roman Catholic Church
( Szent László király római katolikus templom ) , Szabadság tér .
Built in 1925 .
Salla Museum
( Salla Múzeum ) , Kossuth Lajos utca 3 , ☏ +3692 371-004 .
May – Oct Tu – F Su 09:00 – 12:00 13:00 – 16:00 on appointment .
Archaeological site and exhibition about the Roman age of Zala County .
Adult : 500 Ft ; senior , student : 250 Ft.
Zalalövő Heritage Museum
( Zalalövői tájház ) , Petőfi Sándor utca 35 , ☏ +3692 371-004 .
May – Oct Tu – F Su 09:00 – 12:00 13:00 – 16:00 on appointment .
Peasant house with thatched roof .
Built in the middle of the 19th century .
Adult : 300 Ft ; senior , student : 150 Ft.
In Bagod :
Saint Paul Chapel
( Szent Pál-kápolna ) , Rákóczi Ferenc utca , Szentpál , Bagod .
Built around 1260 as round church , rebuilt and extended with a nave and a tower in 1755 .
In Böde :
Saint Michael Archangel Roman Catholic Church
( Szent Mihály arkangyal római katolikus templom ) , Zalaszentmihályfa , Böde .
Interior fittings : 1970s .
The church was founded around 1220 , destroyed churches have been restored around 1750 , the shrine was rebuilt .
Sacristy was built in the 19th century .
In 1923 it was improved and redesigned .
In Kávás :
Kávás Heritage Museum
( Kávási tájházak ) , Temető utca 11 – 13 , Kávás .
Built in the 19th century .
In Vaspör :
Roman Catholic Church
( római katolikus templom ) , Pusztacsatár , Vaspör .
Built in 1736 in Baroque style .
It 's a place of pilgrimage .
In Zalaháshágy :
Trinity Roman Catholic Church
( Szentháromság római katolikus templom ) , Petőfi Sándor utca 7 , Zalaháshágy .
Built in the 12th century , and rebuilt in 1860 in Baroque style .
In Zalaszentgyörgy :
Saint George Roman Catholic Church
( Szent György római katolikus templom ) , Zalaszentgyörgy .
Built in Romanesque style in the 13th century , and rebuilt in the 14th century in gothic style , and rebuilt again in 1756 in Baroque style .
Do
Lake Borostyán
( Borostyán-tó ) .
Lake with beach and sports , fishing possibilities .
Salla Community Center
, Szabadság tér 2 , ☏ +3692 371-004 , ✉ mkk@zalalovo.hu .
M W Th 08:00 - 12:00 13:00 - 19:00 , Tu 08:00 - 12:00 13:00 - 16:00 , F 08:00 - 12:00 13:00 - 21:00 .
Lake Kustánszeg
( Kustánszegi-tó ) , Kustánszeg .
Artifical lake with beach and sports , fishing possibilities .
Pro
Equus Horse Park
( Pro Equus Lovaspark ) , Szent Erzsébet utca 61 , Bagod , ☏ +3620 988-9863 , fax : +3692 460-626 , ✉ info@bagodilovaspark.hu .
Lunge , riding training , trail riding , jump training , riding-tour .
Riding training : 4500 Ft , single room : 7000 Ft , double room : 9500 Ft.
Zabolázó Horse Yard
( Zabolázó Lovasudvar ) , Fő utca 40 , Hottó , ☏ +3630 208-4445 , ✉ jani@zabolazo.hu .
Lunge , riding training , trail riding .
Riding training : 3000 Ft.
Events
Official events
:
Day of Zalalövő Town
( Zalalövő város napja ) .
In July .
Days of Zala Cultural and Equestrian Festival
( Zala Menti Napok Kulturális és Lovas Fesztivál ) .
In August .
Farewell of Pataka Hill
( Pataka hegyi búcsú ) .
On August 20 .
Stum Festival of Zala
( Zalai Murcifesztivál ) .
In September .
Buy
Coop ABC
, Kossuth Lajos utca 6 , ☏ +3692 571-035 . M 05:45 – 18:00 , Tu – Th 05:45 – 18:30 , F 05:45 – 19:00 , Sa 05:45 – 16:00 .

, Szabadság tér 8 . M – F 05:30 – 19:00 , Sa 06:00 – 13:00 , Su 07:00 – 12:00 .

M – Sa 07:00 – 18:00 , Su 07:00 – 12:00 .
Eat
In Zalalövő :
Alapozó Food Bar
, Kossuth Lajos utca 1 , ☏ +3630 881-8587 , ✉ kruerd2013@gmail.com .
M – Th 06:00 – 20:00 , F 06:00 – 21:00 , Sa 07:00 – 21:00 , Su 08:00 – 19:00 .
Food bar . 900 Ft , hamburger : 650 Ft.
Gold Pub and Restaurant
, Szabadság tér 12 , ☏ +3630 334-7977 .
M – Sa 07:00 – 21:00 , Su 07:00 – 12:00 .
Traditional restaurant with local cuisine .
Lunch menu : 895 Ft.
In the surroundings :
Alsó Club and Pizzeria
, Kossuth utca 76 , Gellénháza , ☏ +3630 214-8284 .
M – Th Su 11:00 – 22:00 , F – Sa 11:00 – 23:00 .
Pizzeria and fast food bar . 1350 Ft , pizza : 1500 Ft , hamburger : 650 Ft.
Fakopács Pizzeria
, Petőfi Sándor utca 40 , Teskánd , ☏ +3630 523-3277 .
M – Th 11:00 – 22:00 , F – Sa 11:00 – 23:00 , Su 15:00 – 22:00 .
Pizzeria and fast food bar with some traditional food .
1400 Ft , pizza : 1230 Ft , hamburger : 650 Ft.
Három Fenyő Restaurant
, Olajbányász körút 2 , Gellénháza , ☏ +3670 424-1913 .
M – Sa 06:00 – 22:00 , Su 07:00 – 22:00 .
Traditional restaurant with local cuisine .
Lunch menu : 700 Ft.
Silvestro Pizzeria
, Kossuth Lajos utca 28 , Gutorfölde , ☏ +36309920439 .
M – Th 15:00 – 22:00 , F – Sa 12:00 – 22:00 , Su 13:00 – 21:00 .
Pizzeria . Pizza : 1300 Ft.
Válicka Restaurant
, Válicka utca 2 , Bak , ✉ valickavendeglo@freemail.hu .
M – Th 07:00 – 21:00 , F 07:00 – 22:00 , Sa 09:00 – 22:00 , Su 09:00 – 21:00 .
Traditional restaurant and pizzeria with local cuisine and with specialties like prósza and deer stew with dödölle .
1450 Ft , pizza : 1250 Ft , hamburger : 600 Ft.
